text: On kasonero, ki ʙa nohaq dar zamin sarkasi mekunand, ʙa zudi az ojoti xes rujgardon sozam, cunon ki har ojatero, ki ʙuʙinand, imon najovarand va agar tariqi hidojat ʙuʙinand, ʙa on naravand va agar tariqi gumrohi ʙuʙinand, ʙo on ʙiravand. Zero onho ojotro duruƣ ʙarovardand va az on ƣaflat kardand
